01.label: cheek puffer
01.description: ['The cheeks are evidently puffed out.', 'Corner of the lips are pulled up at a sharp angle.']
01.prescription: ['Pull the corners of your lips up at a sharp angle to puff your cheeks out.']
01.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull the corners of your lips up sharply so that your cheeks do not puff out.']

11.label: cheek raiser, cheek puffer
11.description: ['The cheeks are both raised and puffed out.']
11.prescription: ['Raise your cheeks, and pull the corners of your lips upward to puff your cheeks out.']
11.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your cheeks, and not to ouff out your cheeks.']

001.label: brow lowerer
001.description: ['Eyebrows are lowered and pulled together.', 'Eyebrows are lowered.']
001.prescription: ['Lower your eyebrows and pull them together.']

010.label: outer brow raiser
010.description: ['Outer eyebrows are raised.', 'Outer part of the eyebrows is pulled upwards.']
010.prescription: ['Raise the outer part of your eyebrows.']
010.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise the outer part of your eyebrows.']

011.label: outer brow raiser, brow lowerer
011.description: ['Outer eyebrows are raised, and inner brows are lowered.']
011.prescription: ['Raise your eyebrows, and lower the inner brows.']
011.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise the outer part of the eyebrows, and not to lower the inner part of the eyebrows.']

100.label: inner brow raiser
100.description: ['Inner eyebrows are raised.', 'Inner part of the eyebrows is pulled upwards']
100.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise the inner part of your eyebrows.']

101.label: inner brow raiser, brow lowerer
101.description: ['Inner eyebrows are raised and pulled together, and the outer eyebrows are lowered.']
101.prescription: ['Raise your inner eyebrows and pull them together while lowering the outer parts of the eyebrows.']
101.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your inner eyebrows, and not to lower the outer part of your eyebrows.']

111.description: ['Entire eyebrow is pulled upwards, and the eyebrows are pulled together.']
111.prescription: ['Lift your eyebrows up and pull them together.']
111.prescription_negative: ['Try not to lift your eyebrows and not to pull them together.']

011.label: lid tightener, eyes closed
011.description: ['Eyes are closed, and eyelids are tightened.']
011.prescription: ['Close your eyes and tighten your eyelids.']
011.prescription_negative: ['Try not to close your eyes, and not to tighten your eyelids.']

100.label: upper lid raiser
100.prescription: ['Raise your upper eyelids.', 'Widen your eye aperture.']
100.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your upper eyelids.']

110.label: upper lid raiser, lid tightener
110.description: ['Upper eyelids are raised and the lower lids are tightened.']
110.prescription: ['Raise your upper eyelids and then tighten the lower lids.']
110.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your upper eyelids, and not to tighten the lower lids.']

111.label: upper lid raiser, lid tightener, eyes closed

001.label: lower lip depressor
001.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull down your lower lip.']

010.label: lip corner depressor
010.prescription: ['Pull the corners of your lips down.']
010.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull the corners of your lips down.']

011.label: lip corner depressor, lower lip depressor
011.description: ['The lower lips and the lip corners are pulled down.']
011.prescription: ['Pull down your lower lips and lip corners.']
011.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull down your lower lips and lip corners.']

100.label: upper lip raiser
100.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your upper lip.']

101.label: upper lip raiser, lower lip depressor
101.description: ['Upper lip is raised, and lower lip is pulled down.']
101.prescription: ['Raise your upper lip, and pull down your lower lip.']
101.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your upper lip, and not to pull down your lower lip.']

110.label: upper lip raiser, lip corner depressor
110.description: ['Upper lip is raised, and lip corners are pulled down.']
110.prescription: ['Raise your upper lip, and pull down the corners of your lips.']
110.prescription_negative: ['Try not to raise your upper lip, and not to pull down the corners of your lips.']

111.label: upper lip raiser, lip corner depressor, lower lip depressor
111.description: ['The lower lips and the lip corners are pulled down, and the upper lip is raised.']
111.prescription: ['Pull down your lower lips and lip corners, and raise your upper lip.']
111.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull down your lower lips and lip corners, and not to raise your upper lip.']

01.label: chin raiser
01.description: ['Lower lip and the chin are raised.']
01.prescription: ['Push your lower lip and chin upwards.']
01.prescription_negative: ['Try not to push your lower lip and chin upwards.']

10.label: nose wrinkler
10.description: ['The skin around the nose is pulled upwards and wrinkled.']
10.prescription: ['Wrinkle your nose by pulling the skin around it upwards.']

11.label: nose wrinkler, chin raiser
11.description: ['Nose is wrinkled, and the chin is also pulled upwards.']
11.prescription: ['Wrinkle your nose, and raise your chin.']
11.prescription_negative: ['Try not to wrinkle your nose, and not to raise your chin.']

001.label: mouth stretch
001.prescription_negative: ['Try not to stretch your mouth open.']

010.label: jaw drop
010.prescription: ['Relax your mouth and let your jaw drop.']

101.label: lips part, mouth stretch
101.description: ['Mouth is strecthed open, and lips are wide apart.']
101.prescription: ['Stretch open your mouth, and part your lips widely.']
101.prescription_negative: ['Try not to stretch open your mouth, and not to part your lips.']

110.label: lips part, jaw drop
110.description: ['The jaw is dropped, and the lips are part.']
110.prescription: ['Let your jaw drop, and part your lips.']
110.prescription_negative: ['Try not to let your jaw drop, and not to part your lips.']

111.label: lips part, jaw drop, mouth stretch

01.label: dimpler
01.description: ['Corners of the mouth are tightened.', 'Dimples appear on the cheek, next to the lip corners.']
01.prescription: ['Tighten the corners of your mouth to cause dimples to appear on your cheek.', 'Press your cheeks against your teeth to cause dimples to appear on your cheek.']
01.prescription_negative: ['Try not to tighten the corners of your mouth so that no dimple appears on your cheeks.', 'Try not to press your cheeks against your teeth so that no dimple appears on your cheek.']

10.label: lip stretcher
10.description: ['Lip corners are pulled sideways.', 'Lips are stretched.']
10.prescription: ['Stretch your lips sideways.', 'Pull the corners of your lips sideways.']
10.prescription_negative: ['Try not to stretch your lips sideways.', 'Try not to pull the corners of your lips sideways.']

11.label: dimpler, lip stretcher
11.description: ['Lips are stretched, and dimples appear on the cheek.']
11.prescription: ['Stretch your lips sideways, and tighten the corners of your lips to cause dimples to appear.']
11.prescription_negative: ['Try not to stretch your lips sideways, and not to tighten the corners of your lips.']

01.label: lip corner puller
01.description: ['Lip corners are pulled back and upwards.']
01.prescription: ['Pull the corners of your lips back and upwards.', 'Smile more.']
01.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull the corners of your lips back and upwards.']

10.label: nasolabial deepener
10.description: ['Muscles next to the nose wings are deepened.', 'Nasolabial furrows are deepened.']
10.prescription: ['Deepen the muscles next to the nose wings.']
10.prescription_negative: ['Try not to deepen the muscles next to the nose wings.']

11.label: nasolabial deepener, lip corner puller
11.description: ['Lip corners are pulled back and upwards, and the muscles next to the nose wings are deepened.']
11.prescription: ['Smile more, and deepen the muscles next to your nose wings.']
11.prescription_negative: ['Try not to pull the corners of your lips back and upwards, and not to deepen the muscles next to your nose wings.']

001.label: lip suck
001.prescription: ['Suck your lips in.', 'Pull your lips into your mouth.']
001.prescription_negative: ['Try not to suck your lips in.']

010.label: lip pressor
010.prescription_negative: ['Try not to press your lips together.']

011.label: lip pressor, lip suck
011.description: ['Lips are sucked in and pressed together.']
011.prescription: ['Press your lips together, and suck your lips in.']
011.prescription_negative: ['Try not to press your lips together, and not to suck your lips in.']

101.label: lip tightener, lip suck
101.prescription: ['Tighten your lips, and suck your lips in.']
101.prescription_negative: ['Try not to tighten your lips, and not to suck your lips in.']

110.label: lip tightener, lip pressor
110.prescription: ['Tighten your lips, and press them together.']
110.prescription_negative: ['Try not to tighten your lips, and not to press them together.']

111.label: lip tightener, lip pressor, lip suck
111.description: ['Lips are tightened, pressed together, and sucked in.']
111.prescription: ['Tighten your lips, press them together, and suck them in.']
111.prescription_negative: ['Try not to tighten your lips, not to press them together, and not to suck them in.']
